climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Dolby Vison HDR - Dolby Vision transforms your TV experience with dramatic imaging – incredible brightness, contrast, and color that bring entertainment to life before your eyes. In addition, this TV supports HDR10+ and HLG high dynamic range formats.
4K Ultra HD- With over 8 million pixels, 4 times the resolution of 1080p - enjoy every scene with breathtaking detail.
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Screen damage-not a problem
reviews.reviewText: Although the tv arrived with a damaged screen, GaNE was wonderful. They made it very easy to set up a return and refund. Friendly efficient customer service help by phone and online. I will shop with them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great display with normal Smart TV hiccups.
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased three economy-class UHD TVs in the past year... always for a guest room or somewhere else where I don't spend much time. While this TV isn't perfect, the picture quality is amazing. I despise smart TVs, so I have a 4K FireStick and a Chromecast Ultra connected to it, both with wired ethernet. I went ahead and bought a Vizio sound bar to go with it, and am now able to enjoy any/all content I want with either the FireStick's interface or using an app on my phone for the Chromecast. Yes, I know the TV is cast enabled and has streaming apps. Again, I despise smart TVs. I tested the functionality of the TVs smart features, and was expectedly underwhelmed. This is not Vizio's fault. I hated Smart TVs going in. I have since disabled the TVs network connection, and rely solely on my FireStick's remote to control everything. I could not be happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought my first ever “renewed” item when I made this purchase. Shortly after the 90 day warranty period, the TV started acting up, not showing any content that had motion. It would just show still shots. So no regular TV. No steaming videos. I contacted support and instead of trying to offer any help or suggestions, they told me my purchase was out of warranty and offered no help other than “call Vizio”.I should have bought a warranty with this. That’s on me.But I would not buy from this company ever again. They obviously do not stand behind their products, and they do not care to help customers when there is an issue. The latter is something that is generally expected these days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent price and product
reviews.reviewText: I picked this TV up after my dad got the exact same one so I already knew what I was getting in to and I'm not disappointed because I had been looking into getting a 4k TV for a while for my Xbox and PlayStation. I love the clarity and quality of the picture and I enjoy popping Netflix up without fussing with my consoles when I don't feel like it. The only caveat I have is sometimes when I'm watching Netflix the blacks get a little too dark and wash out some of the clarity but never when I'm gaming but that might simply be a setting on the TV or the quality of the image streaming from Netflix. Overall I love this TV and I'm super satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2019
reviews.reviewText: We loved this TV, but it randomly stopped working yesterday. It acted as if we cracked the screen and had the rainbow thing going on in the corner. We decided we'd just deal with it, but we turned it on later and it wouldn't work at all... just black screen. Very disappointing. Nothing happened to it as far as we know. We no longer have a functioning TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This company is what they promote
reviews.reviewText: When I had ordered this TV I couldn't believe what I was doing after the fact that seeing quite a few people we're given it a one star and bad feed back but after I had received it I couldn't be more happy with my decision I'm grateful and excited I got me a tv at a great price i recommend this company and there products to family and friends and now my next purchase is going to be a sound bar. I'm content with my product Thanks again for a great item will be back to see what else they got for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The legs for the TV stick out far useless so be very careful take your measurements
reviews.reviewText: The legs are huge and stuck it so far I literally had to get a two by four to ghetto rig s entertainment stand for this . I hate TV's with open legs like that at the very ends . Rendered my stand completely useless and had to put it at toddler flood level fishing kids smashing it 😭. So we rigged it up hopefully incab get some sort of wall mount or corner mount It's been so long since I bought a TV I didn't even think to check the measurements on the legs of the TV because all the TVs I vowed the stand is in the middle of the TV not on each edge So yeah I had to deconstruct my entertainment stand and we're trying to figure out a way to get it up higher off the ground so the kids don't break it as much money as I paid for it you think I would get a free wall mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars TV is fine if it will turn on
reviews.reviewText: This TV is the absolute bane of my existence. It rarely turns on the first time I hit power. By rarely I mean like 1 time out of every 15. The other times is a guessing game of various techniques to finesse the TV to turn on. Once it is on it tends to work just fine. Except every so often the picture inverts to the negative and then I need to reboot the TV. Then I have to figure out how to get the TV to turn back on again. I have tried unplugging all the HDMIs and then powering on, I have to unplug hold for 10 seconds and then plug back in, switch between the power and the input buttons on the back of the TV, and so on. I have had good experiences with Vizio in the past, but this specific one is a piece of trash and not remotely worth the effort.
